original_text:
One's pride will bring him low,
    but he who is lowly in spirit will obtain honor.
korean_text: 사람이 교만하면 낮아지게 되겠고 마음이 겸손하면 영예를 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: One's pride will bring him low
but he who is lowly in spirit will obtain honor.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 심령이 겸손한 자는 존귀를 얻으리라
